abstract: Tornante Company and Sinclair Broadcast Group join to form Tornante-Sinclair, which will focus on producing original television shows that will be broadcast by local stations; focus is in sense return for Tornante chief executive Michael D Eisner, who has had past success in television.
lead_paragraph: The former Disney chief’s newest company, Tornante, is teaming up with Sinclair Broadcast Group to produce and distribute new syndicated shows to be aired mostly during the day by local stations.

headline.main: Eisner Brings His Media Expertise to Local TV Markets
headline.print_headline: Eisner Takes Media Savvy to Local TV

snippet: The former Disney chief’s newest company, Tornante, is teaming up with Sinclair Broadcast Group to produce and distribute new syndicated shows to be aired mostly during the day by local stations.
